description.english: Complete 5 levels in a row without using any PowerUps

displayName.japanese: 集中力マックスレベル1！

displayName.japanese: 集中力マックスレベル2！

displayName.japanese: エクスターミネーター！

description.english: Kill more than 4 monsters using power rings before completing a level
description.french: Tuer plus de 4 monstres en utilisant des anneaux de pouvoir avant de terminer un niveau

displayName.japanese: イガグルミなんか怖くない！

description.spanish: Usa 2 o más escudos de energía para completar un nivel

displayName.japanese: タイムリミットなんて関係ない！

description.english: Complete the level when the timer reads 2 seconds or less to finish

description.spanish: Completa el nivel cuando el cronometro marca 2 segundos o menos para terminar

description.english: Use a power ring to repel the attack of the underground arm
